title: so vi, lucian, quinn, garen(like he really needed a skin) gankplank, and azir get new skins

replies.body:
What if they'd made lunar revel yorick? That would have been awesome.

As for the champs you mentioned, most have only been out about half a year. There are a lot of other champs that need skins first. Yorick is the exception, though, as he's been around for 6 years and only has two skins.

nah those champions with the exception of azir and Lucian really didnt need those skins they have enough as is i feel the champions with less skins should always be prioritized first, i think jhin and aurelion would have made perfect candidates for the warring kingdoms skins but i guess not maybe next patch ( i always tell my self this only to be disappointed when they give more skins to champions with 5+ already)
I can't really see jhin with a lunar revel skin, but that's just me.
